entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
